ReportContentDesc: Use this form to report any content that you believe could be viewed as offensive from a diversity and inclusion perspective.
ReportContentGroupsLabel: What groups might this offend? Please check all that apply.
ReportContentDetails: Please describe what the content is and why it might be offensive (e.g. Character look, dialogue, etc.)
Hotkey_Tip_Controller: Launch from anywhere by holding {s1} and pressing {s2}
ReportContentSummaryDesc: Short, one sentence summary of what is offensive
